title: The key plan drawn to a scale of not less than 1:4000 shall be submitted along with the application for a Building Permit and Commencement Certificate showing the boundary locations of the site with respect to neighbourhood landmarks or features within the radius of 200 m
clause_text: The key plan drawn to a scale of not less than 1:4000 shall be submitted along with the application for a Building Permit and Commencement Certificate showing the boundary locations of the site with respect to neighbourhood landmarks or features within the radius of 200 m. from the site whichever is more.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
